hero.title: WatchListy
hero.subtitle: Your <highlight>ultimate companion</highlight> to track, organize and discover your favorite movies and series.

features.title: Everything you need to <highlight>manage your movies</highlight>
features.subtitle: WatchListy combines all essential features to track your favorite movies and series in one elegant and intuitive place.

feature1.title: Smart search
feature1.description: Instantly find any movie or show using our complete database and advanced suggestion system.

feature2.title: Watch tracking
feature2.description: Mark movies you've seen or plan to see, and monitor your progress with detailed statistics.

feature3.title: Ratings and reviews
feature3.description: Rate your favorite movies, write reviews, and discover recommendations from our passionate community.

feature4.title: Custom lists
feature4.description: Create thematic lists (to watch, favorites, by genre) and organize your collection your way.

feature5.title: IMDB integration
feature5.description: Access IMDB ratings, full synopses, and detailed information directly from our platform.

feature6.title: Recommendations
feature6.description: Get personalized suggestions based on your tastes and watch history.

testimonials.title: What our users say
testimonials.subtitle: Thousands of movie lovers use WatchListy every day to organize their favorite films and shows.

user2.name: Thomas L.

user3.name: Sophie M.
